features: 【Military Grade Standard & 5ATM Waterproof】This military smart watch for men is made of special composite materials and a metal shell, making it rugged and durable. Njord gear smart watch has passed various tests for durability, including drilling, crushing, exposure to hot steam, salt spray, and liquid contamination. Additionally, it can continue to function even in very low temperatures.

【Bluetooth Calls & Message Notification】This men's smart watch is equipped with a 5.0 Bluetooth chip, allowing you to make and receive calls, receive text messages from your mobile phone, control music playback, and even take pictures with your phone's camera. With this watch, you can free your hands and stay connected while socializing and entertaining. You'll never miss important information again, and you won't have to take out your phone all the time.

【Multifunctional Smart Watch for Men】Bluetooth voice call rugged smart watches features include social media message notifications and previews,AI voice assistant,blood pressure,blood oxygen,dynamic heart rate,sleep monitoring,alarm clock,calculator, breathing exercises, calorie counting,usiness cards,sedentary reminder,stopwatch,flip wrist light-up,remote camera,music control,weather forecast,multi dial switching,drinkwater reminder,100+ sports modes

【400mAh Large Battery Capacity & DIY HD Touch Screen】Military tactical sports smart watch has 400mah battery capacity with standby time up to 30 days and normal working time up to 7-10 days. 1.39'' HD touch screen with 360*360 pixels. Adjustable 5 brightness levels, so you can see the content of the watch in strong outdoor light. Built-in rich UI, 7 local classic UI, and close to 200 UI in the APP store to choose from. Customize your personal UI to show your personality.

【Personal Health Assistant】This smart watch for men supports 24-hour heart rate monitoring, real-time blood pressure /blood oxygen detection. There is also sleep monitoring to record your sleep time and detect your sleep status (deep sleep, light sleep, eye movement mode). Monitoring data can be saved for 30 days, so you can better understand your physical condition and develop a healthy routine.

【100+ Sport Modes】This fitness tracker watch features over 100 sports modes, including cycling, running, basketball, rugby, skiing and more. Through Bluetooth connection APP you can download more sports, such as ball sports, water sports, equipment sports, etc. Smartwatch can be used to monitor critical data such as workout heart rate, distance traveled, movement speed, and calories burned in real time for most sports modes, to help you track and improve your athletic performance.

【Satisfactory Service & Great Compatibility】SUNKTA military smartwatch with 12 months warranty is suitable as an anniversary or birthday gift for your loved ones, family, and friends.When you receive the smart watches,if you have any problems,such as watch accessories,quality problem,operation problem and charging problem and so on,please contact us and We will provide you with a solution within 24 hours.Smart watches are compatible with Android 4.4 and above, IOS 8.0 and above.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SUNKTA Milatary smart watch for men This military smartwatch is made of high-strength metal material and has undergone multiple outdoor environmental tests to ensure its waterproof and shockproof durability. The screen brightness is adjustable, making it easy to display time and other functions in various lighting conditions. Supports Bluetooth voice calls, message notifications, and music playback on the watch.The package includes two watch straps: black steel with black silicone and silver steel with orange silicone. You can choose the style that matches your social scenario.With a 400mAh large capacity battery, the device can last up to 30 days on standby and up to 10 days with regular use.The device features a one-button Bluetooth connection for easy operation.

Bluetooth call and message notification Intelligent call reminder, support for dialing, answering and refusing calls.You can add up to 10 frequently used contacts and browse through call records with ease.Intelligent synchronization of cell phone messages and vibration alert (reply messages are not supported).Supports various apps such as Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, SMS, WhatsApp, Email, WeChat, and more. *When you receive multiple notifications, the smart watch may shorten the content of each notification. However, you can view the preview by clicking the title of each notification.

Multifunctional smartwatch This men's smartwatch features multiple built-in functions and will be a great companion in your daily life. Weather Forecast（Fahrenheit/Celsius）AI Voice AssistantSleep Monitor24-hour heart rate trackingPedometerMusic PlayersReal-time blood pressure/blood oxygen dataBreathing exercises/Sedentary reminder/Drinking water reminderStopwatch/TimerAlarm clock/CalculatorPasscode LockFind a phone / Find a watch The weather forecast is out of sync with the mobile phone?I want to set it to Fahrenheit. Check whether "weather push" is turned on in the "FitCloudPro”APP page.（Open the "FitCloudPro”APP>Click on the "Me" page >Click on "Units">Set your customary unit)

Customize your personal dial Featuring a 1.39'' HD full touchscreen display with 360*360 pixels, this smartwatch provides super clear picture quality restoration. You can adjust the brightness to 5 levels, making it suitable for outdoor sports enthusiasts. 7 Local Classic UIDownload the FitCloudPro app, which offers a selection of almost 200 UI designs to choose from.The app supports syncing various types of phone photos, such as selfies, family photos, pet photos, and landscapes, for you to use as your personalized dial.

Bluetooth connection steps How to connect with the samrt watch？ Search “FitCloudPro” on Google Play or APP Store or scan the QR code to download.Open the "FitCloudPro" APP,click the "+ Bind Device" button on the "Devices" screen.Tap "K-52" to pair. How to use Bluetooth voice call? Make sure that your watch has a Bluetooth connection with your mobile phone.Slide the watch screen to the right and click the "Call" icon.Check whether the smart watch turns on "Call audio". How to open "Media audio"? Swipe the screen to the right and click on the "phone icon" in the bottom left cornerOpen "Media audio" What to do if the band gets broken or the watch not hold a charge?Please ask us if you have any questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy a smart watch. My husband has never had a watch so I wanted something that was easy yet durable. I was surprised at the weight of the watch, heavier than I thought but in a good way in so that you can tell the quality. Very appealing to the eye and was easy to set up. It has proven to be very durable and long lasting on a single charge. I looked at other watches that were more expensive but the reviews of this watch sold me and I'm not disappointed in the least. Great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch, better customer service
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a watch to help track my fitness specifically walking more than anything. I looked at several watches but settled on this one based off my needs and price. Best decision I made. Now blood pressure and O2 are what they are for a watch but I was worried the pedometer would be one that just adds 3 steps every 10 seconds but it’s actually very accurate. I was able to use photo for watch face and it’s got really good resolution. Easy to see. Watch is made very well and does not feel cheaply made at all. 1 thing I really like is you can set whether you want phone audio through watch or just alerts. It uses Bluetooth and watch will ring when phone does or it will just vibrate. But it allows you to decide whether you want alert audio, music/phone calls through watch. It’s very customizable. I haven’t tested waterproofness (if that a word) but also don’t really plan to. Only trouble I had is my wrist were a little bigger and the metal band didn’t fit but the silicone band it comes with worked fine. I was however hoping for the metal band and the watch came with a card with contact info should I need any help with the product. I reached out to the customer service and asked if they sold any larger metal bands that I could get to wear. They promised a response within 24 hour on the card and all my responses from them were writhing 8 (unless it was their days off) they are getting me set up with more pieces for my band to be extended (also it comes with tool to make that easy which was an added bonus). Amazing customer service and watch was everything I needed and wanted it to be. Not disappointed in my purchase in the least.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch as a gift for my sibling. He loves it! He had an older android phone which it paired with. The problem was he only received messages from an ios. To send messages from an android you had to ahut the data off. He has since uogrded to a new android phone. I'm happy to report he receives all messages without anyone having to do any weird stuff.Durability- At his work he is constantly moving and hitting stuff. The watch is a champ, it takes a licken and keeps on ticket, to say the least. If this is the type of work you do. If your looking for a reasonable priced watch that not only is stylish (which in a construction type of environment or any work environment that you move or may hit your hands wrist etc.) isn't really a must, it isn't poorly made it has some weight to it (I hope that makes sense), is compatible with android and iPhone, and can even be worn out on date night or just an everyday watch. THIS IS FOR YOU! I can reassure you this is a great gift for anyone who doesn't want to pay the outrageous price for a galaxy or apple watch. That man who needs to wear a watch, likes metal watches vs the rubber bands this is the perfect option for him. It's also great for the ladies who like big faced watches. Women who of bigger stature a need bigger watches because "ladies" watches look like they're wear a watch the size of dime on their wrists this is for you. I have no doubt you'll be delighted with your purchase. Hopes this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Husband loves it!
reviews.reviewText: It takes BP, SPO2, and HR. It has a step tracker, and all the functions an I watch would have. Very durable and wearable. My husband absolutely loves it and wears it all the time! He loves being able to change the background of the watch face. He rates it as one of the best gifts he’s received. Very inexpensive for what you get. I would like a female version for myself at some point. He’s had lots of compliments and several people asking where we got it. Great purchase and well worth the money. Highly recommend it for anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice watch, and keeps time.
reviews.reviewText: I've worn a watch for many years, and it was time for me to get a new one. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a watch, but I wanted to try out a smart watch. I figured it could keep time since it would be synced to my phone and that was really all I wanted. My old watch never had to be charged, but it's not a big deal, I get about three days on a charge. I wear gloves at work with cuffs that come up over the watch, it's a problem because it rubs on the watch face and randomly changes the settings. It stopped waking up when I would look at it and I thought it had broken. It had randomly set a timer for it not to come on. That gave me the idea to use the timer when I am at work to prevent all the settings from getting jumbled up, I just have to push the button to see the time, problem solved. Over all, it does everything the description says. I love being able to see when I get a text because my wife and I text back and forth all day from work and before, I may go a couple hours before checking my texts. Now I just look at my watch when it buzzes. I chose this one because it had the metal band, I don't care for the straps. I have showered with It on with no problem. I have an android phone and have had no problem with connectivity. The app works good, not real complicated. I didn't get it for the fitness tracker but it seems to be working, most dial faces show the steps, heart rate and calories burned. One thing it really doesn't work very well at is showing an accurate temperature, not really something I need from my watch so for me it's not a problem. I know it shows that you can run over it, and use it to break walnuts, and stab it with a screw driver, but I still bought a screen protector for it, I know how my old watch looks. For the money I don't think you can go wrong, I would recommend it to people wanting a budget smart watch.

reviews.reviewTitle: For the price, does the job. most functions work ( no GPS) with iPhone 8, good value, giftable 👍
reviews.reviewText: Product Dimensions ‎22 x 4.6 x 1.2 cm; 200 gm, screen display size ‎1.32 "🧐 use NOT for BP, hR, not 100% accurate, health metrics as these small units are not reliable. FitcloudPro app, pretty low to average for music, calls. Text and social media notifications work.Heavier than Samsung, Garmin and I watches. Small screen size, customizable brightness and contrast. Team during daylight. Ready to go with basic apps for health tracking . 50% after 3 days, Five days per charge, with basic settings and brightness. Two-year warranty. 2 replaceable wristbands (metal and silicone), pens to change in between. get it on sale 🤪 Benefiting by other reviews, I ❤ to share mine. Hope this helps ✌

reviews.reviewTitle: I REALLY like this smart watch. It looks great and performs even better
reviews.reviewText: First off, this watch has build quality, looks and functionality all rolled into one and I love it!The watch comes in a presentable box that is ideal for gift giving.The manual is not the best but it certainly provides what you need to understand the watch and be up and running.The watch comes with the typical proprietary, magnetic, multi pin USB cable, which I am not a huge fan of because I have had one go missing on my for another watch and they simply seem to be impossible to replace. That having been said, ALL the watches like this comes with proprietary cables, even though many of them look like they should be interchangeable.Setup was a little more involved than I have found to be, typical. Because of the many features, this watch (like all the others) requires an app and the has two seperate device connections for screen/data transfer as well as one for the audio feature on the watch which is a pretty functional speaker. The sound actually surprises me.Among the various features of this watch, there is also a level of aesthetic customization available through the app that allows for a few 7 different "watch face" backgrounds. This is becoming more common and is awesome because it is really like having a few different looking watches in your drawer to chose from.The watch features physical buttons as well. They allow for "waking up" the watch when it is not actively displaying anything as well as various mode selections and metrics selections for reading the data that thr watch is recording for you. Ie: steps, calories burned etc...The heart rate monitor seems quite accurate when it was compared simultaneously with an actual heart rate monitor that we have in the house. We are impressed by that.Aside from the built in exercise modes, this smart watch also provides you with the ability to make and answer calls, as music, select tracks, read emails and texts etc... All from your wrist.I have tested a number of these watches and this one, is by far, my favorite. It looks the part, is well made and is super functional. It is easily my best experience to date. At $50, I also believe it to be the best value out there at this time, as well.Definitely recommended.

Pros: Good quality screen with 360x360 resolution and bright with good contrast. Recording of many exercises and biological functions. Fast menus and many watch faces (with APP installation). Comes with two straps.Cons: App doesn't work on all devices. IP67 waterproof but not able to swim. Heavy and bulkier then more costly models. Does not have automatic brightness setting.The SUNKTA smart watch for men looks good, fits well and has a 1.32 inch screen with a resolution of 360x360. The screen looks good and you can select brightness and contrast settings. The watch has a 128MB Rom and 128K SRAM, 260mAh battery, Bluetooth 5 and is controlled manually with a button on the side.The watch has many different functions that include call control, voice assistant, set password, sleep monitor, heart rate monitor, SMS and social media alerts and tracks out your workouts and what type of activity. There is also blood pressure, pulse, oxygen saturation, sleep and other biometrics that can be tracked.The watch is built with good quality has an IP67 and is made from metal and plastic on the outside. The watch comes with two straps and tools to remove the pins and replace them when changing straps. The package includes a USB cord charger, soft wiping cloth, instructions and warranty card. When first using the watch and app together you will need to find the watch which is easiest by looking at the Mac address found in the watch settings which will match the FitcloudPro app list of devices to pair (my house is full of Bluetooth capable devices so the Mac address helped with the unnamed ones).Using the watch on its own is possible however you need the FitcloudPro app to really get the most use out of the device. This watch does not have GPS so will rely on the phone for location. You will likely have to give a few permissions to make sure the watch is able to connect to the phone services properly.The watch is definitely a great upgrade over this price point a few years ago. The display is good quality and clear even in bright daylight (ensure you turn brightness up). There is a good amount of installed apps to record all things related to activity and health and can be tracked well with the companion app. In reality the watch lasts about 2-3 days per charge depending on how active and which settings you have set. The brightness and screen on time being the largest drain on battery power.The watch has a two year warranty and is definitely a good value for what you receive.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really beautiful but basic bluetooth watch, with good battery life
reviews.reviewText: Overall I like this smart watch, but like a lot of these non-Android/Apple/Fitbit watches, they're really just bluetooth devices for your smart phone with some typical fitness features. The heart rate and pedometer hardware, and the ability to see messages and make calls is really the primary feature of these devices. If they can do this with good battery life and avoiding the pain of constant pairings then its done its job.I really like the clear, bright screen. The display resolution is excellent. However there is no (from what I can tell) light sensor, and so the brightness is entirely dependent on you setting it. I tell you, if you go to a movie theatre with this watch and check the time regularly or simply stretch your head so the face turns on, people will ask you to turn it off. It's bright and won't auto dim.The casing is handsome but I find fake styling to be a waste. There is no compass, so including the NESW detail around the face is silly. It looks nice in a picture but if you think for 1 second about it, you'll realize it's a fake marketing bit.The crown and buttons have limited purpose. Clicking either of the buttons will bring up the apps, you can use the crown dial to scroll or just swipe on the screen, but either way, you have to touch the app/list item to select it. Which buttons get used when an app is running is up to you to figure out. The workout timers work well enough (they're timers that track heart rate and steps) but you'll just click anything expect to pause, cancel or get back to the main screen. It's basic but that's fine for a <$100 Bluetooth watch.The SmartLife app is basic and honestly I don't want to create another account with a password I need to worry about from a small company for a basic feature watch. There's a guest option when using the app. The match time is sync'd via the app, and I won't be surprised if the watch has clock drift and you'll need to sync it regularly to fix the clock if you're using it primarily has a workout BPM/step tracker.Lastly we come to the battery. I'm surprised none of the reviewers here mentioned a word about it, or how to charge it. The charging cable is proprietary, which is a disappointment actually. If it can't do wireless charging, then USB-C would be fine, even if it means worrying about its IP67 rating. The charging connector doesn't attach firmly to the back. It's magnetic but barely and the wrist band will easily push it off the back face mounting area. Charging isn't all that fast and if you thought it was doing so over night but the connector wasn't secured, you'd find a low battery in the morning. Other bluetooth watches I've seen have a kind of plastic clip to secure the contact. Maybe that's the answer as these magnets aren't reliable and if you lose the cable, that's it.As for battery life, I've used the watch infrequently over the last week. I fully charged it last Sunday and I write this review 7 days later. Since I work from home mostly, at a keyboard, I don't need or want a watch on my wrist while working. I used it during 3 workouts, an evening skiing, and 2 snow clearing sessions. I made a total of 4 calls and accepted 1. During skiing I received 3 messages (I typically have work focus on during the day, so no message alerts until evening). I did not charge the watch during this time, and I just left it on my desk when not using it. Battery drain when just sitting there, bluetooth not connected, screen off, is really great. Like the % barely moves. When I sat down to write this review, the battery indicator said 68%! I'm convinced I accidentally charged it at some point this week but I don't think I did. Impressive.

reviews.reviewTitle: La montre est très belle, précise, se charge rapidement et garde sa charge pendant des jours.
reviews.reviewText: Je peux faire des appels directement avec celle-ci. La qualité d'appel est irréprochable, j'entends très bien la personne au bout du fil et la personne m'entend très bien. Plus besoin de traîner mon téléphone avec moi quand je m'entraîne.De plus, cette montre offre de multiples options telles que le moniteur de fitness, le rappel sédentaire, le chronomètre, le suivi du sommeil, le moniteur d'oxygène dans le sang, le contrôle de la musique, la caméra à distance, les prévisions météorologiques, etc.La montre est très belle, précise, se charge rapidement et garde sa charge pendant des jours.Sa configuration est très simple, installée son application sur le téléphone, se connecter sur son application sur le téléphone, se connecter sur le téléphone à partir de l'application et non par le Bluetooth du téléphone (très important), et le reste de la configuration se fait à partir de l'application.Elle vibre et affiche des messages pour Facebook, Twitter, Messenger, vibre quand il y a des appels qui entre, mais il faut au préalable donner les accès à partir de l'application (très importante).Je suis très fier est très flatté par cette belle montrée.Mais pour ce qu'elle coûte, impossible de se tromper. Je la recommande.
